text: Both the Worship session and the prophetic session we attended (tried to) was not family friendly at all. There were two pages of guidance for having children in the prayer room which basically sounds like they donâ€™t want children there. I have attended IHOP rooms in the US and they were much more accommodating and friendly toward families. Very disappointed.

One thing I have asked from the Lord , that I shall seek: That I may dwell in the house of the Lord all the days of my life, To behold the beauty of the Lord And to meditate in His temple.
Psalms 27:4
A blessed place for enjoying God's presence. Pray that more people join this ministry and more sessions will be added soon!
